name: CHAMPION JOCKEY
description: "Champion Jockey™: G1 Jockey & Gallop Racer" depicts the Horse Racing universe through a collection of real world races and immersive and intuitive gameplay. Through the motion control functionality of the PlayStation®Move motion controller, players will learn how to use the horse's reins and whip to victory. Experience what it feels like to be a Jockey! THE RACE IS YOURS FOR THE TAKING!
